/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban structures. A large concrete overpass arches over the street, its curved shape adding an architectural interest to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, indicating the city's active transportation system. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the overpass and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
